title: 65: OBITCH class is in session...
description:
That’s right Geoffs put on those learning caps because summer is over and it’s time to go back to school. Your favorite professors are taking you through the concept of promession and the backstory behind the wild discovery of some bejeweled remains! We’ve got an obituary for our obituary hall of fame, and one who’s name made us hungry, and of course we’ve got some dumba.ass.criminallllls! 


New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promession

https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/a-burial-machine-that-will-freeze-your-corpse-vibrate-it-to-dust-and-turn-it-into-soil

https://nypost.com/2018/04/16/freeze-drying-dead-bodies-could-be-the-future-of-cremation/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JgWUhH8Buk4

https://www.fosters.com/obituaries/pprt0274779

https://manitousprings.org/emma-crawford-coffin-races/

https://www.learnreligions.com/martin-luther-biography-700828

https://education.nationalgeographic.org/resource/protestant-reformation

https://www.biography.com/religious-figure/martin-luther#:~:text=Martin%20Luther%20was%20a%20German%20monk%20who%20began,and%20controversial%20figures%20in%20the%20history%20of%20Christianity

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/meet-the-fantastically-bejeweled-skeletons-of-catholicisms-forgotten-martyrs-284882/

https://www.bizarrepedia.com/catacomb-saints-skeletons/

https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/skeletons-waldsassen-basillica

https://www.themarysue.com/trial-by-combat

https://reliquarian.com/2016/08/07/the-catacomb-saints-bedazzled-skeletons-of-the-counter-reformation/comment-page-1/#:~:text=Relics%20of%20Catacomb%20Saints%2C%20North%20Wall%2C%20Pfarrkirche%20Sankt,including%20the%20preservation%20and%20veneration%20of%20holy%20relics


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

That’s right Geoffs put on those learning caps because summer is over and it’s time to go back to school. Your favorite professors are taking you through the concept of promession and the backstory behind the wild discovery of some bejeweled remains! We’ve got an obituary for our obituary hall of fame, and one who’s name made us hungry, and of course we’ve got some dumba.ass.criminallllls! 


New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.
